frontmatter.title: FluxNews
frontmatter.meta_description: FluxNews is complete app that fully integration Wordpress website

markdownRemark.html:
Release Change Logs

version 1.0.0 (09/09/2019):

1. Great UX design: multi-level categories, quick product filter, super smooth checkout flow, searching keyword historyâ€¦ 
2. Flexible homepage config with Banner Slider, Banner Grouping, Flexible product column views. 
3. User Profile which useful setting: push notification to turn on/off, get notification unread, view wishlist, order history, rate the app on app stores. 
4. Social Logins by Facebook SDK. 
5. Push notification (with notify history) via Firebase 
6. Google Analytic via Firebase. 
7. Easy to restyle and theming by on your branding sites. 
8. Offline local caching. 
9. Compatible with the latest Wordpress blogs. 
10. Compatible with latest Opencart (with free Free Opencart API is included) 
11. Easy registration by SMS Login by Facebook Account Kit 
12. Instance synchronization from mobile to the server. 
13. Perfect splash animation by using new Flare. 
14. Working really well on both iOS and Android with support with 60 frames per second (fps).
